caption.p: DPK alleviates CIPN-induced oxidative stress and inflammation in vivo. Effect of DPK treatments on the oxidative stress status of the nerve tissue was evaluated through MDA level (A), GSSG level (B), and GSH:GSSG ratio (C). Observations are represented through individual graphs for each parameter. (D) Anti-inflammatory effect of DPK treatment was evaluated through serum levels of TNF-α. Data are represented as mean ± SEM, where N = 6 in all groups, except GABA, where N = 5. Data were statistically analyzed using one-way ANOVA followed by Dunnett’s multiple comparisons test and observation represented as # p < 0.05, when significantly different in comparison to NC; * p < 0.05, ** p < 0.01, when significantly different in comparison to DC.
